name: Khojguru
description: Discount, Coupons, Sale Info in India
overview:
Khojguru helps a user in India save money and time. It provides discount coupons from several of the user’s favorite brands/retailers/restaurants and tell upto date information on where sales/offers are going on. And all this in available in a very easily browsable format.

Further, the platform provides more local information about the outlets like where is the nearest store, what is the menu like, what do other people think of this brand/outlet, what all products are offered, can i see some photos, what is the phone number etc. It has detailed local information of every outlet which makes it an important player in local search. For more please visit the website www.khojguru.com
